name: ghostspeak
description: Pure protocol for AI agent commerce on Solana blockchain - 2025 Production Implementation

scripts.build:packages: bun run build:sdk && bun run build:cli
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:packages
scripts.clean:packages: cd packages/sdk-typescript && bun run clean && cd ../cli && bun run clean
scripts.test:workspace: cd packages/cli && bun run test && cd ../sdk-typescript && bun run test
scripts.test:all: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration && bun run test:perf && bun run test:security && bun run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: bun run qa:all && bun run test:all
scripts.qa:lint: bun run lint:rust && bun run lint:ts
scripts.qa:type-check: bun run type-check:root && bun run type-check:packages
scripts.qa:audit: bun audit && cd programs && cargo audit
scripts.qa:all: bun run qa:lint && bun run qa:type-check && bun run qa:format-check && bun run qa:audit && bun run qa:kluster
scripts.lint: bun run lint:rust && bun run lint:ts
scripts.type-check:packages: cd packages/sdk-typescript && bun run type-check && cd ../cli && bun run type-check
scripts.setup:devnet: solana config set --url https://api.devnet.solana.com && solana airdrop 2
scripts.setup:testnet: solana config set --url https://api.testnet.solana.com && solana airdrop 10
scripts.ci:install: bun install && cd programs && cargo check
scripts.ci:build: bun run build:all && bun run idl
scripts.ci:deploy: bun run ci:build && bun run deploy:devnet
scripts.ci:pipeline: bun run ci:install && bun run ci:build && bun run ci:test
scripts.ci:full: bun run ci:pipeline && bun run ci:deploy
scripts.dev:reset: bun run clean && bun run setup:devnet && bun run build:all
scripts.audit: bun audit && cd programs && cargo audit
scripts.precommit: bun run qa:all && bun run test:unit
